<Heading as={'h1'} className={'openapi__heading'} children={'Delete an assistant'}></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint method={'delete'} path={'/assistants/{id}'} context={'endpoint'}></MethodEndpoint>

Delete an assistant by ID

<Heading id={'request'} as={'h2'} className={'openapi-tabs__heading'} children={'Request'}></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
    parameters={[
        { in: 'path', name: 'id', required: true, schema: { type: 'string' }, description: 'Assistant ID' },
        {
            in: 'query',
            name: 'isDeleteBoth',
            required: false,
            schema: { type: 'boolean' },
            description: 'Whether to delete both the assistant and its associated resources'
        }
    ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
    id={undefined}

    responses={{

            description: 'Assistant deleted successfully',
            content: { 'application/json': { schema: { type: 'object', properties: { success: { type: 'boolean', example: true } } } } }
        },
        '400': {
            description: 'The specified ID is invalid',
            content: {
                'application/json': {
                    schema: {
                        type: 'object',
                        properties: {
                            error: { type: 'string', example: 'Error message' },
                            status: { type: 'integer', format: 'int32', example: 400 }
                        },
                        required: ['error'],
                        title: 'Error'
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        '404': {
            description: 'Assistant not found',
            content: {
                'application/json': {
                    schema: {
                        type: 'object',
                        properties: {
                            error: { type: 'string', example: 'Error message' },
                            status: { type: 'integer', format: 'int32', example: 400 }
                        },
                        required: ['error'],
                        title: 'Error'
                    }
                }
            }

        '500': {
            description: 'Internal error',
            content: {
                'application/json': {
                    schema: {
                        type: 'object',

                            error: { type: 'string', example: 'Error message' },
                            status: { type: 'integer', format: 'int32', example: 400 }
                        },
                        required: ['error'],
                        title: 'Error'
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }}
></StatusCodes>
